content.rendered:
The SOS Children’s Village Islamabad is remarkably a momentous initiative striving for the best. The success story of the SOS Village is not hidden from anyone. All over Pakistan, there are a number of outlets of this esteemed organization that are striving for the welfare of society. It would not be wrong to say that the SOS Children’s Village Islamabad is a venture of excellence. The SOS Children’s Village consists of 15 family homes. They have been serviceable since June 2011 accommodating 106 children.

Objectives of SOS Children’s Village Islamabad

The notion of the SOS Children’s Village Islamabad is fundamentally an ultimate milestone in the development of not only society but it is a modern approach towards the prosperity of children. The first and the foremost objective of the SOS Children’s Village is to facilitate orphans and to ensure their bright future. Originally, this humane project was established with the goal of providing shelter to children affected by the 2005 earthquake, who had previously been lodged in momentary shelters in Lahore and Rawalpindi. The school volunteers them a safe as houses accommodation and attempted to meet all the primary and secondary needs of fortified children. In a very short time span, SOS Children’s Village is has become one of the best and obligatory shelter homes for children who are deprived of their families. SOS Children’s Villages is proudly providing them the family environment closer to natural homes, education, coaching classes, and job training. Along fulfilling the basic requirements, the objective of the SOS Children’s Village is to enhance their confidence, faith in their selves and to polish their potentials.

Intents of the SOS Children’s Village Islamabad

Indeed, SOS Children’s Village Islamabad is a worth- appreciating initiative that is bringing betterment in our society. It is essentially important to recognize the unconditional concern and to call thundering applause for their enthusiasm. The intents of this venture are to secure the future of our country with its zeal and zest. Howbeit, all the intents of SOS Children’s Village revolve in an orbit around merely one motive that is to secure a child’s future and provide him/her an upright life.

Dynamism behind Conquest of SOS Children’s Village

To chase their motive, they are striving hard to polish their character, personality, abilities and, manners. The school is endeavoring to provide them a normal and secure life that was taken from them by the horrible earthquake of 2005. The efforts of SOS Children’s Village are visible and the enthusiasm is enormous. One of the most remarkable and appreciating contributions of the school is providing them a family environment. It all is just because of their revolutionary objectives, dedication, and keenness. Thence, students do not feel lonesome rather more secured and protected. Consequently, they feel and enjoy a sense of belonging which is truly important for their personality building. Howbeit, the children learn moral values, share responsibilities and form life-long relationships. Since the family environment provides them a compacted and concrete foundation on which they can establish their lives.

A Lucrative Corporation

Working for the welfare of children, the institute is also paying heed to their moral development of character and personality.  This is truly a humane endeavor to give veracious direction to their instincts. The focal aim of SOS Children’s Village is to assist them in becoming morally and ethically virtuous individuals. For that, the management of the SOS Children’s Village is direly pinpointing their religious upbringing. Religious edification is an integral component of the school. In addition to this, Extra-curricular activities are also devised which includes sports and musical events, scouts and girl guides, games, cooking and art classes. These extra-curricular activities exert as a positive reinforcement to the children who have taken a bumpy ride in the bygone days. Children are also sporadically taken to trips as well. Since some of the children have gone through miserable and tough times, or come from neglected and sometimes ferocious circumstances, the facility of psychological counseling is also offered to resolve their mental issues. Verily, the SOS Children’s Village is an endorsement of triumph.

 A Pledge of Magnanimous Outlook

Notable that the organization is not just providing them shelter but also taking care of their basic needs. The school has taken the accountability of their secured future and notably fulfilling each and every commitment. Children are shielded from moral exploitation or any sort of abusing conduct and are kept safe during in any circumstances. Howsoever, all the primary and secondary needs of children are sought to be satisfied with their sound development.
